entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 2:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
